titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 2939) to amend title 28, United States Code, with respect to the appointment of independent counsel.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-315.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/23/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2939 (independent counsel appointments).
